components.title: Microsoft Project 2016 V1R1
components.description: Est amet velit ipsum. Neque velit adipisci non consectetur.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement cm-5.(3).

implemented-requirements.description:
Add-ins to Office applications must be signed by a Trusted Publisher.
Trust Bar Notifications for unsigned application add-ins must be blocked.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement cm-7..

implemented-requirements.description: Warning Bar settings for VBA macros must be configured.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement sc-18.(1).

implemented-requirements.description:
Add-on Management functionality must be allowed.
Links that invoke instances of Internet Explorer from within an Office product must be blocked.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement sc-18.(3).

implemented-requirements.description: File Downloads must be configured for proper restrictions.

Enabling IE Bind to Object functionality must be present.
Scripted Window Security must be enforced.
Protection from zone elevation must be enforced.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement sc-18.(4).

implemented-requirements.description: ActiveX Installs must be configured for proper restriction.

Disabling of user name and password syntax from being used in URLs must be enforced.
Saved from URL mark to assure Internet zone processing must be enforced.
Navigation to URLs embedded in Office products must be blocked.
Untrusted intranet zone access to Project servers must not be allowed.
